questions.question: What is the predominant color of the bag's primary surface?
What appears to be the primary material of the product packaging?
What is the overall shape of the product container?
Describing the bag's texture, is it glossy or matte?
What type of seal is visible at the top of the bag?
What is the general orientation of the text on the bag's back?
Are there any noticeable markings other than text on the bag's back?
Considering the bag's design, what is its implied purpose?
Is there a clear visual indication of weight or volume?
Judging by the visual elements, what is the product category likely to be?
Describe the color of any secondary design elements on the packaging.
What is the visible level of detail in the printed text on the bag?
What is the appearance of the bag's edges or seams?
Observing the bag, does it appear flexible or rigid?
Does the bag display any prominent logos or brand names?
